item.title: Crosswalk for R Package DESCRIPTION file
item.description: The following table displays the crosswalk mapping of terms from the R package DESCRIPTION file to codemeta properties. Property R Package Description codeRepository URL creator [cre] Author dateCreated - dateModified - datePublished Date editor - license License description Description name Package url URL depends Depends, SystemRequirements suggests Suggests maintainer Maintainer licenseId License issueTracker BugReports givenName givenName familyName familyName email email
